title: user authentication flow
description: Test the complete user authentication process including registration, login, and secure data handling for both patient and doctor accounts to ensure no errors occur and data is protected.

title: appointment booking system
description: Verify that the booking system accurately schedules appointments with the correct treatment, doctor, and time slots, including optional video consultation support.

title: accommodation booking functionality
description: Test accommodation booking to ensure correct room tiers, pricing, and availability are reflected and bookings are properly linked to hospital locations.

title: payment processing with discounts
description: Validate secure payment processing through Stripe and Razorpay gateways, ensuring the 15% platform discount is correctly applied to all bookings.

title: content management operations
description: Test content management features including creation, editing, and deletion of blogs and user feedback to ensure no data loss and proper functionality.

title: search functionality accuracy
description: Verify that the search functionality returns accurate and relevant results across treatments, doctors, hospitals, and content entities.

title: platform performance under load
description: Test the platform's ability to support concurrent users without performance degradation, ensuring stability and responsiveness.

title: medical reports access control
description: Ensure that medical reports and consultation data are accessible only to authorized users, maintaining privacy and security.
